title: Does the emote for the teams still include the icons?
body: Sorry if this is a dumb question, but I was wondering if the emotes for the teams still include the icons like they did a few weeks ago? Or is the combination of say, SKT emote, and SKT icon, is 450 RP + 250 RP? Thanks in advance!

replies.body: Those icons and emotes were separated out of their bundles. You'll need to buy each separately now.
